summary: 3/11/16 LFT  REAR TIRE BUBBLE IN OUTSIDE SIDE WALL.  TIRE PRESSURE WHEN COLD - 80PSI.  IDENTIFIED AFTER 250 MILE FREEWAY DRIVE; STOPPED FOR FUEL & VEHICLE INSPECTION; FOUND BUBBLE. REPLACED TIRE WITH SPARE.  TIRE REPLACED UNDER WARRANTY.   TRAILER WEIGHT 11,300 LBS.  TIRE INFO:  ST235/80R16, DATE CODE:  R2NX 2915.

7/21/2016, LEFT FRONT TIRE BUBBLE IN OUTSIDE SIDE WALL.  TIRE PRESSURE WHEN COLD:  80 PSI.  IDENTIFIED AFTER 1100 MILE FREEWAY TRIP WHILE REFUELING VEHICLE AND PERFORMING VEHICLE WALK AROUND INSPECTION.  REPLACED TIRE WITH A NEW TIRE, SAME SIZE, SAME LOAD RATING, DIFFERENT BRAND SO NOT TO USE MY ONLY SPARE.  TRAILER WEIGHT;  12,300 LBS. TIRE INFO:  RAINIER ST 235/80R16.  DATE CODE: R2NX 2915.  WARRANTY CLAIM PENDING.

4/8/2016 RIGHT FRONT TIRE RUPTURED BUBBLE ON INSIDE SIDE WALL.  TIRE PRESSURE WHEN COLD 80 PSI. IDENTIFIED AFTER 5 MILES OF CITY DRIVING, ENROUTE TO LOCAL TIRE SHOP TO HAVE THE LEFT REAR TIRE REPLACED (CLAIM #: 10893953), HEARD A LOUD "POP" WHEN PULLING INTO THE TIRE SHOP PARKING LOT.  TRAILER WEIGHT  9,950 LBS. TIRE INFO:  RAINIER ST 235/80R16.  DATE CODE:  R2NX 2915.  TIRE WAS REPLACED UNDER WARRANTY WITH THE SAME SIZE, BRAND AND DATE CODE.
